dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Chris Slater
dmca.body:
> Original Message Follows:
> -------------
> From: crs@spamcop.net
> Subject: Re: [#76864859] Notice of Copyright breach of TOS
> Date: Thu, 5 Oct 2006 13:48:59 +0100
>
> *LEGAL NOTE* This copyright notice is "NOT" granted under any
> circumstances for
> use or display or comment by chillingeffects.org. Theft of this notice and
> more
> so the poem within by chilling effects.org themselves, will result in
> immediate
> criminal action and prosecution of sender and recipient in person breaking
> the
> law. And criminal charges for deliberate breach of copyright laws by
> chilling
> effects.
>
> Chilling effects.org are deliberately knowingly using poems from such
> copyright
> notices to bring traffic to search engines via the illegal use of material
> sent
> to google hence making a total and absolute mockery of copyright notices
> and the
> law.
>
> Notice of Copyright reference
> http://phonexay.blogspot.com/2006_04_Ol_phonexay_archive.html
> Mr C R Slater
> C/O 49A City Road
> Newcastle upon Tyne
> NE12AQ England
> 07871430052
> 05/oCTOBER/2006 1:45 UK TIME
>
> Sir, Madam,
>
> I am the genuine true author/owner and copyright holder of the below
> verse/poem
> illegally taken from my Greeting Card web site, this has been stolen and
> displayed along with my name, (as such already clearly proving without any
> doubt what so ever, rightful ownership) by said visitor to your customers
> site
> despite notice clearly displayed registered copyright and not for reuse.
>
> This material is now currently illegally displayed on your server without
> any
> given author/owner consent. My Greeting Card sites have been online since
> 1986.
> I write material to raise income for three registered UK charities these
> provide
> me with copyright on all my verses/poems works.
>
> I swear on oath (also as a committed Christian) under penalty of Federal
> and
> European prosecution for perjury that I am author and copyright holder of
> the
> said material (displayed as below along with my name).
>
> A signed copy of this notice is "NOT" required by your company the data
> thief
> has also included my name with the material. The material must as such be
> removed within 24 hours and no less.
>
>
> /Christopher R Slater/
> Christopher R Slater
> ALL Rights Reserved
>
> Poem displayed on your site clearly marked as on my own web site at
> location(s)
> given below.
>
> CRS (R)(c) 2004
> All Rights Reserved
> NOT FOR REUSE
>
>
> http://phonexay.blogspot.com/2006_04_Ol_phonexay_archive.html
> Poem of Enchantment
>
> ChrisRS (R)(c) 2004
>
> "The Lonely Path of Love"
>
> I give up on love for it's never once at all enough,
> The path it leads hearts downs in shambles so rough.
> Staying single I'll manage, I'll find a much better way,
> Find a serene peaceful path, with no cracks of dismay.
> -
> Some paths are meant for two, yet some for just one,
> Many have twists and turns, forever winding on and on.
> Occasionally the sun shines, lighting a hearts path's way,
> Other time's thunderstorms ever make it dull and grey.
> -
> Like an uphill journey, love can seem much hard work.
> Often only one leading, the other, their part they'll shirk.
> Many times the path has butterflies and fairies at play,
> Other times there's only darkness, gloom and dismay.
> -
> My hearts route has been changed, time and time again,
> So perhaps on my own, it's maybe much more to gain.
> If you too walk this path, and walk the route on your own,
> Then you're not alone, I've a map or two you can loan.
>
> posted by usmcrpxy @ 2:53 PM 0 comments
>
> *LEGAL NOTE* This copyright notice is "NOT" granted under any
> circumstances for
> use or display or comment by chillingeffects.org. Theft of this notice and
> more
> so the poem within by chilling effects.org themselves, will result in
> immediate
> criminal action and prosecution of sender and recipient in person breaking
> the
> law. And deliberate breach of copyright laws by chilling effects.
>
> Chilling effects.org are deliberately knowingly using poems from such
> copyright
> notices to bring traffic to search engines via the illegal use of material
> sent
> to google hence making a total and absolute mockery of copyright notices
> and the
> law.
